common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Use this API to edit Auto Product Ads

error_list.name: ads.auto_product.no_eligible_sku
error_list.description: No eligible SKU for auto product ads.

error_list.name: ads.shop.campaign_not_match
error_list.description: Invalid campaign ID for this shop.

error_list.name: ads.campaign.error_date_setting
error_list.description: The start/end date of campaign should be larger or equal to today. End date to be empty for unlimited duration.

error_list.name: error_not_found
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: ads.api.http_method_not_allowed
error_list.description: Only the supported HTTP method for the API is allowed.

error_list.name: ads.edit.invalid_action
error_list.description: Edit Action is invalid as per the current status of the campaign.

error_list.name: ads.campaign.invalid_start_date
error_list.description: The start date has to be today for no end date (unlimited duration).

error_list.name: ads.campaign.not_auto_product
error_list.description: Campaign ID does not belong to auto product ad.

error_list.name: ads.auto_product.not_whitelisted
error_list.description: This shop (shop id) isn't eligible to set up auto product ads.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.campaign_level
error_list.description: Too many requests at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_partner_api
error_list.description: Too many requests, please reduce the request rate and try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_shop_api
error_list.description: Too many requests for the shop at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_api
error_list.description: Too many requests at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

request_sample:
[{"type":"Payload","value":"{
	"reference_id": "asd-qwer",
	"campaign_id": 1234,
	"edit_action": "start",
	"budget": 20.5,
	"start_date": "11-11-2023",
	"end_date": "17-11-2023"
}"},{"type":"Java","value":"Unirest.setTimeouts(0, 0);
HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://partner.test.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ads/edit_auto_product_ads?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp")
.header("Content-Type","application/json")
.body("{
   \"budget\": 20.5,
   \"campaign_id\": 1234,
   \"edit_action\": \"start\",
   \"end_date\": \"17-11-2023\",
   \"reference_id\": \"asd-qwer\",
   \"start_date\": \"11-11-2023\"
}")
.asString();"},{"type":"PHP","value":"<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.test.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ads/edit_auto_product_ads?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "budget": 20.5,
    "campaign_id": 1234,
    "edit_action": "start",
    "end_date": "17-11-2023",
    "reference_id": "asd-qwer",
    "start_date": "11-11-2023"
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;
"},{"type":"cURL","value":"curl --location --request POST 'https://partner.test.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ads/edit_auto_product_ads?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
   "budget": 20.5,
   "campaign_id": 1234,
   "edit_action": "start",
   "end_date": "17-11-2023",
   "reference_id": "asd-qwer",
   "start_date": "11-11-2023"
}'
"},{"type":"Python","value":"import requests
import json

url = "https://partner.test.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ads/edit_auto_product_ads?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "budget": 20.5,
  "campaign_id": 1234,
  "edit_action": "start",
  "end_date": "17-11-2023",
  "reference_id": "asd-qwer",
  "start_date": "11-11-2023"
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.RPCRequest("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)
"}]
